00097 class ValidityPeriodFormat {
00098     public:
00100         enum Format { // do not change order 
00102             NotPresent = 0,
00104             Enhanced,
00106             Relative,
00108             Absolute
00109 
00110         };
00111 
00113         ValidityPeriodFormat();
00115         ValidityPeriodFormat(Format format);
00117         ValidityPeriodFormat(UINT8 bit_field);
00118 
00120         Format GetFormat() const;
00122         void SetFormat(Format format);
00123 
00125         void UpdateData(UINT8 *data) const;
00126 
00127     private:
00128         // bitmask for relevant data (00011000)
00129         static const UINT8 m_mask;
00130         // the format is stored within the bits 3 and 4 of one byte
00131         BitField8 m_bit_field;
00132 };

00166

00259 inline INT BcdByteToInt(UINT8 bcd) { return ((((INT)((bcd) & 0xf0) >> 4)) + (INT)((bcd) & 0x0f) * 10); };
00260 inline UINT8 IntToBcdByte(INT val) { INT tmp = (val / 10) & 0x0f; return ((UINT8) (tmp | ((((val - tmp * 10) & 0x0f) << 4) & 0xf0))); };
